** 10 《鄉黨篇第十》

10.1孔子於鄉黨，¶

便便言，¶
唯謹爾。

# src: LY 10.02, D.C.Lau 10. p 87
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-2a>¶
10.2朝，¶

左右手，¶
衣前後，¶
襜如也。¶
趨進，¶
翼如也。¶
賓退，必復命曰：¶	KR1d0028_008:61a:4:14:1,KR1d0028_009:24a:6:1:1,KR1d0030_012:15b:8:10:0,KR1d0033_025:20b:2:11:49,KR1d0038_008:21a:2:26:1,KR1d0049_019:62a:7:10:192,KR1d0086_016:27a:3:26:188,KR1d0086_082:14a:2:1:92,KR1d0087_238:17b:4:35:22,KR1d0087_240:39b:5:27:99,KR1g0009_005:12b:3:17:3,KR1h0004_010:3a:10:1:2,KR1h0006_005:22a:4:18:32,KR1h0007_010:2a:9:6:6,KR1h0007_010:2b:5:32:6,KR1h0012_005:17a:7:10:60,KR1h0015_005:9b:6:34:6,KR1h0020_002:32a:6:10:174,KR1h0028_008:34a:9:1:109,KR1h0038_009:21b:5:1:109,KR3a0059_032:13b:1:1:2

# src: LY 10.04:01; tr. CH
10.4入公門，¶

過位，¶

<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-8a>¶
出，¶
降一等，¶
逞顏色，¶

0500_004:0793a:19:11:42,KR6s0013_063:0726c:2:19:68,KR6s0013_075:0797b:7:10:327
如不勝。¶
上如揖，¶

<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-33a>¶
10.16康子饋藥，¶

曰：¶
「丘未達，¶
不敢嘗。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-34a>¶

# src: LY 10.17; tr. CH
10.17廄焚。¶
子退朝，¶
曰：¶
「傷人乎？」¶
不問馬。

# src: LY 10.18; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-35a>¶
10.18君賜食，¶
必正席，先嘗之。¶	KR1d0057_006:17a:8:11:0,KR1d0086_082:10b:8:13:73,KR1d0087_119:38a:6:10:176,KR1d0091_004:42b:3:11:2,KR1g0009_005:16b:2:4:3,KR1h0004_010:35a:2:1:23,KR1h0006_005:34a:5:4:41,KR1h0012_005:27a:6:4:95,KR1h0012_005:27a:8:4:95,KR1h0017_010:24b:11:4:165,KR1h0019_002:52a:2:17:153,KR1h0019_002:57a:5:4:171,KR1h0020_002:34b:7:4:197,KR1h0021_000:126b:9:4:575,KR1h0024_007:7b:6:33:4,KR1h0024_010:19b:5:29:6,KR1h0026_005:26a:4:4:91,KR1h0028_008:48b:6:4:184,KR1h0034_008:51b:7:4:183,KR1h0038_009:32b:7:4:184,KR1h0039_003:28b:2:18:152,KR1h0043_010:27a:3:4:94,KR3a0046_002:17a:2:12:7,KR3a0047_087:8b:6:11:4,KR3a0059_012:1b:6:9:2,KR3a0059_032:21a:2:4:2,KR3a0108_037:33b:8:11:28,KR3k0003_069:10a:6:12:5,KR3k0008_016:22b:4:6:33,KR3k0012_709:2b:2:12:5,KR3k0012_999:2b:2:12:13994,KR3k0055_382:25b:4:8:23,KR3k0055_393:16b:8:6:5,KR3k0056_236:49a:5:25:4,KR4d0202_015:13a:2:9:2,KR5h0033_021:016a:6:15:16,KR6s0013_068:0753c:11:12:109
君賜腥，¶
必熟而薦之。¶	KR1d0041_008:43a:8:4:2,KR1d0057_006:17a:8:20:0,KR1d0086_082:11a:1:4:74,KR1d0087_119:38a:6:19:176,KR1d0091_004:42b:3:20:2,KR1g0009_005:16b:2:13:3,KR1h0004_010:35a:4:1:23,KR1h0005_005:17a:2:2:0,KR1h0006_005:34a:6:9:41,KR1h0007_010:15a:10:6:16,KR1h0007_010:15b:4:34:16,KR1h0012_005:27a:6:13:95,KR1h0012_005:27a:8:17:95,KR1h0015_005:13b:3:1:6,KR1h0017_010:24b:11:13:165,KR1h0017_010:25a:3:14:166,KR1h0019_002:57a:5:13:171,KR1h0020_002:34b:7:13:197,KR1h0021_000:126b:9:13:575,KR1h0024_010:19b:6:6:6,KR1h0026_005:26a:4:13:91,KR1h0026_005:26a:8:15:91,KR1h0028_008:48b:6:13:184,KR1h0034_008:51b:7:13:183,KR1h0038_009:32b:7:13:184,KR1h0039_003:28b:3:7:152,KR1h0043_010:27a:3:13:94,KR3a0046_002:17a:2:21:7,KR3a0047_087:8b:6:20:4,KR3a0059_032:21a:2:13:2,KR3a0108_037:33b:8:20:28,KR3k0008_016:22b:4:22:33,KR3k0056_236:50a:2:8:4,KR3k0057_022:3b:5:20:41,KR4b0009_007:4a:6:9:11,KR4d0202_015:13a:2:18:2,KR4h0132_529:3b:5:20:4,KR4h0132_529:16b:5:20:13,KR4h0134_062:21b:8:20:135,KR5h0033_021:016a:7:7:16
君賜生，¶
必畜之。¶

君視之，¶
東首，¶
加朝服，¶
拖紳。

雖車馬，¶
非祭肉，¶
不拜。

居不客。

# src: LY 10.26; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-46a>¶
10.26升車，¶
必正立，¶
執綏。
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-47a>¶
車中，不內顧，¶	KR1h0004_010:47a:1:1:31,KR4h0001_003:19a:22:1:18
不疾言，¶
不親指。

# src: LY 10.27; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_010-48a>¶
10.27色斯舉矣，¶
